description: GoMLX: An Accelerated Machine Learning Framework For Go

Developed a machine learningbased framework to assess credit risk in World Bankfunded projects across India. Integrated financial and macroeconomic data to model PD, EAD, LGD, and ECL using CatBoost, applied SHAP for interpretability, and performed sectoral aggregation and stress testing for portfolio risk insights.

TensorFlow is an open-source machine learning framework developed by Google. It provides strong support for various platforms, especially Linux, and is widely adopted in the industry due to its active community and production-ready capabilities.
Framework for experiments regarding the mass estimation of massive objects in astrophysical collision-driven systems using machine learning models

A machine learning framework using Logistic Regression, Random Forest, and XGBoost to detect credit card fraud in real time. Built on the Kaggle dataset, it delivers scalable, explainable, and business-ready risk scoring for banks and financial institutions.
Equitrain: A Unified Framework for Training and Fine-tuning Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials

A comprehensive, data-driven framework for optimizing shot peening processes to enhance the fatigue life of critical aerospace aluminum alloys. This project integrates Machine Learning (ML) for accurate residual stress prediction and Response Surface Methodology (RSM) for multi-objective process parameter optimization.

Mapping Alternate Scenarios of Forest Intactness (MASFI) is a cloud-based machine learning framework. It uses XGBoost regression and remote sensing data such as GEDI LiDAR to create high-resolution maps and statistics, supporting protected area planning and management.
The AIP-G 1.0 (Alzheimers disease, Inhibitor Predictor for GSK-3, version 1.0) pipeline implements a two-stage machine learning framework for predicting GSK-3 inhibitors for Alzheimers disease.

A knowledge repository of advanced AI concepts and agent frameworks, featuring expert-level markdown guides on machine learning, deep learning, NLP/LLM, and multi-agent system design patterns. Ideal for researchers, developers, and teams building robust, scalable AI solutions.
ytopt: machine-learning-based autotuning and hyperparameter optimization framework using Bayesian Optimization
Python SHIELD Machine Learning Framework - is a custom framework for AI/ML development compatible with Cuda, XPU and CPU. It also supports DDP.

A machine learning framework for simulating and predicting random walks. Includes parameterized bias sampling, enhanced feature engineering, multi-dimensional support, and real-world applications such as financial markets, IoT sensor drift, healthcare monitoring, and cybersecurity.

A machine-learning powered web application that detects emotions from text using a trained NLP model. Includes a modern, responsive UI with emoji-based predictions, animated probability bars, dark/light mode, and real-time prediction history. Built using Python, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript without any frameworks.

Cross-platform benchmarking framework for evaluating machine learning models in ransomware detection across macOS, Linux, and Windows. Includes 8 ML algorithms tested on the MLRan dataset with comprehensive performance metrics.
Machine Learning framework for predicting mental-health risk from social-media text with sentiment analysis, linguistic features, TF-IDF, and carbon-emission tracking.
Machine learningdriven backtesting framework for EUR 10-year rates, featuring intraday TP/SL execution, walk-forward modelling, and performance analytics.
Python project integrated with machine learning and django framework.
In this part, we work with machine learning frameworks, such as Scikit-learn orNumpy.
Enterprise graph machine learning framework for billion-scale graphs for ML scientists and data scientists.
Machine Learning Framework

This project aims to bridge this gap by building a complete credit risk classification pipeline that delivers predictive accuracy while also providing thorough interpretability through two widely used explainability frameworks

Modular Forensic Triage Framework -Cross-platform evidence extraction & prioritization for Android, iOS, Windows, and Linux. Integrates NLP, behavioral anomaly detection, and memory analysis with 97.4% detection coverage and 2.7x faster triage than traditional tools.Digital Forensics Machine Learning NLP Cross-Platform Python Android IoS Windows

Flask deployment is the process of integrating and hosting a trained machine learning model using the Flask web framework. It allows your model to be accessed through a simple web interface or REST API, where users can input data and instantly receive predictions. This makes your ML project interactive and usable.
Real-Time Edge Detection Framework for Autonomous Driving Track Using Traditional Machine Learning on Raspberry Pi

A collection of neural network components implemented from scratch using only NumPy. This project focuses on deepening the understanding of machine learning theory by building everything manually without high-level frameworks.
Open Machine Learning Compiler Framework
Data and Codes for Integrated Design Framework for Titanium Aluminides Through Interpretable Machine Learning

An open-source dataset of synthetic power quality disturbances (PQD), ideal for training and validating machine learning models. Signals are generated using established mathematical models from scientific literature, with parameter ranges conforming to the IEEE 1159 standard. Includes a Python analysis framework for statistical exploration.
Interpretable Machine Learning Framework for Designing High Ionic Conductivity in Low-Temperature Lithium-Ion Battery Electrolytes
An Open Source Machine Learning Framework for Everyone

The Context-Aware LSTM Framework for Intelligent News Categorization and Real-Time Dispatch is an end-to-end machine learning project for classifying news articles into four categories (World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech). It utilizes a trained LSTM model (or a Logistic Regression/SVM model combined with TF-IDF, based on the joblib pipeline)

A lightweight and modular Model Extractor tool for loading, analyzing, and exporting machine-learning models. Supports extracting model layers, parameters, weights, metadata, and architecture summaries from frameworks like PyTorch or TensorFlow. Ideal for ML engineers who need to inspect, debug, convert, or document model structures.

Machine Learning Framework for Identifying Lymph Node Metastasis Biomarkers in Breast Cancer. This repository provides an end-to-end workflow integrating differential expression analysis, machine learningbased feature selection, survival modelling, and external biological validation for robust biomarker discovery.
A collection of hands-on machine learning and deep learning projects, including image classification, text classification, and summarization with modern frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, HuggingFace)

AI Driven Semantic Framework for Advanced Cyber Threat Analysis and Sharing using comprehensive machine learning and deep learning framework for real-time cyber threat detection, analysis, and intelligence sharing.

A platform developed from an open framework to help AI researchers and developers to rapidly prototype, test and deploy workflows that include machine learning models as worker components. The workflow can be invoked on command line or web service, as well as integrated into UX/UI as part of a larger intelligent solution.

A real-time Sign Language Detector using computer vision techniques, particularly hand gesture recognition. The system leverages OpenCV for image processing and python-based machine learning frameworks, to recognize hand gestures and translate them into readable text. MediaPipe is used to efficiently track hand movements.

Methodological framework for low-cost sensor calibration and air quality monitoring. Public repository developed as part of a PhD research on signal processing and machine learning for environmental metrology.

A robust machine learning framework for Credit Risk Modeling. Implements SMOTE for class imbalance and compares Logistic Regression, Decision Trees, LightGBM, and XGBoost. Optimized via threshold tuning to identify high-risk demographic and behavioral profiles.

AIxOps Engineering is a unified framework for MLOps, LLMOps, and AIOps. It provides end-to-end pipelines, best practices, and tools to build, deploy, monitor, and scale machine learning models, large language models, and AI-driven systems, enabling streamlined AI lifecycle management across diverse environments.

A real-time Digital Twin framework for Predictive Maintenance (PdM) of rotating machinery. Uses MQTT for live sensor data streaming, Streamlit for dashboard visualization, and Machine Learning models (Random Forest/LSTM) to predict Remaining Useful Life (RUL) and detect anomalies.
This repository includes all the code developed during my in-depth exploration of machine learning and deep learning frameworks.

Uva Wellassa University final year Research project witch made with machine learning and using Yolo and U-Net frameworks. The following was made to determine diabetic eye disorders using image processing.
A hybrid optimization framework that integrates machine learning and optimization algorithms to improve couriertask allocation and routing efficiency in real-world conditions

An end-to-end NLP pipeline that benchmarks Classical Machine Learning, Embedding-based models, and Fine-Tuned Transformers to detect fake news ,balancing accuracy, interpretability, and real-world scalability.

This project builds a machine-learningdriven decision engine that detects fraudulent financial transactions and quantifies its business impact. It forms the foundation of a scalable risk intelligence framework.
A rust powered machine learning framework for python

Framework, toolkit and ready-to-use applications for numerical linear algebra dependent machine learning algorithms.

A comprehensive AI project featuring machine learning model training, AI agent implementation using Microsoft Agent Framework, REST API, React UI, and Azure Development Kit evaluation with Docker deployment.
Repository for DFT- and GCMC-derived datasets and machine learning workflows used to predict propylene/ethylene (P/E) selectivity across zeolite frameworks.
Curated list of Kotlin libraries, tools & frameworks for AI, LLMs, agents, DSLs, and machine learning.

HackGPT Enterprise is a production-ready, cloud-native AI-powered penetration testing platform designed for enterprise security teams. It combines advanced AI, machine learning, microservices architecture, and comprehensive security frameworks to deliver professional-grade cybersecurity assessments.
A cutting-edge AI-driven network intrusion detection system that combines classical deep learning, quantum machine learning, probabilistic reasoning, and explainable AI into a unified framework.

AI Innovation at Google DevFest ATL 2025 This repository showcases our AI project developed for Google DevFest Atlanta 2025. The project integrates machine learning, real-time data processing, and intelligent automation to solve real-world challenges through innovative use of Google Cloud AI and open-source frameworks.

This repository showcases a complete machine learning project integrated with Streamlit framework for experiment tracking, model management, and reproducibility. It includes data pre-processing, model training, evaluation, and deployment-ready tracking using Streamlit.

The ECG Analysis and Classification Project is an end-to-end framework for detecting cardiac conditions automatically from electrocardiogram (ECG) signals using machine learning and deep learning techniques.  Built around the PTB Diagnostic ECG Database, this project integrates three main modules:  Data Processing and Visualization  signal cleanin

A curated portfolio of high-impact Data Science projects, featuring Machine Learning (Prediction Models), Data Analysis, and utility applications. Demonstrates proficiency in Python, ML frameworks, and business intelligence.
DIfferentiable MOlecular Simulator (DIMOS): A pyTorch based framework for machine-learning enhanced simulations
Implementation of a unified explainability and trust framework for machine learning-based flood risk prediction, including SHAP, LIME, counterfactuals, robustness analysis, and the UFXI metric.

We present a comprehensive physics-informed machine learning frameworkPhysics-Guided Equation Discovery (PGED)that discovers a full, interpretable dynamical equation for the geomagnetic Dst index using only its historical time series. Trained on 139,872 hourly measurements, PGED recovers an 11-term sparse ordinary differential equation that.

A comprehensive machine learning framework for multi-step stock price forecasting using ensemble methods combining deep learning, statistical models, and gradient boosting. This project implements a sophisticated stock price forecasting system that combines multiple machine learning approache.

This project is a complete, end-to-end machine learning workflow to predict passenger survival from the famous Titanic dataset. The primary goal was to build a reliable classifier while mastering a repeatable framework for data cleaning, feature engineering, and model training.

PiXie Ops - Lightweight devops framework on top of Kubernetes & Terraform (OpenTofu) which simplifies cloud-native deployment to the same complexity level as Docker Compose. Ideal for demo's and proof-of-concepts in AI, machine learning pipelines and RAG. Works locally on Kind and in cloud on Azure via push. Can pull images, but does not do CI/CD
SecureFedChain: A Blockchain-Enabled Federated Learning Framework with Homomorphic Encryption for Privacy-Preserving Distributed Machine Learning

Build a credit risk prediction model and apply SHAP and LIME to explain global and local decisions. Compare both methods, analyze discrepancies, and produce an interpretable, regulator-friendly explanation framework for fair and transparent loan approvals.

A machine learning framework using Logistic Regression, Random Forest, and XGBoost to detect credit card fraud in real time. Built on the Kaggle dataset, it delivers scalable, explainable, and business-ready risk scoring for banks and financial institutions.

An explainable machine learning framework for predicting compressive and flexural strengths of CNT-reinforced composites using Random Forest and XGBoost. Includes preprocessing scripts, model training, parity plots, ICE-based interpretability, and evaluation metrics.

An AI-powered virtual mental health support system developed using the RASA framework that provides personalized therapy through chatbot interactions. It leverages NLP and machine learning to understand user emotions, offer tailored guidance, and recommend professionals.The system achieved 100% accuracy in conversation and action-level evaluations.

This project presents a complete machine-learning framework for predicting and optimizing CO capture efficiency in an MEA-based absorption system, one of the most widely used post-combustion carbon capture technologies.

A machine-learningdriven, attack-phaseaware vulnerability prioritization framework integrating CVSS, EPSS, MITRE ATT&CK, and the Unified Cyber Kill Chain (UCKC) to compute dynamic risk scores with adaptive weighting and SHAP explainability.
Machine learning-based classification framework for detecting spatially extended and diffuse emission in the high redshift universe, using multi-band broadband imaging.
Integrated Machine Learning and Deep Learning Predictive Maintenance Framework using AI4I 2020, NASA CMAPSS, and PHM 2012 datasets.

A comprehensive machine learning framework for analyzing and predicting crude oil shipping risks across multiple transport modes (pipelines, storage, road, and vessels) using Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks. This project incorporates advanced risk analytics including market risk, PD, expected credit loss, and insurance risk modeling.
An Cost-Sensitive Adaptive Machine Learning Triage Framework for Predicting Alzheimers Disease Progression
A unified framework for machine learning with time series
Anvil is a Rust-based machine learning framework designed to combine the performance of low-level linear algebra with the ease of high-level ML APIs.

scikit-learn_bench benchmarks various implementations of machine learning algorithms across data analytics frameworks. It currently support the scikit-learn, DAAL4PY, cuML, and XGBoost frameworks for commonly used machine learning algorithms.

A deep exploration of Algorithmic Empathy, the next frontier in AI understanding. This project examines how machines can learn from human fallibility, model disagreement, and align with moral reasoning. It blends psychology, fairness metrics, interpretability, and co-learning design into one framework for humane intelligence.
A Machine-Learning Framework for Epileptic Seizure Identification using Bangalore EEG Data

Machine learning models for optimizing beneficiary targeting in Peru's Pension 65 social program. Case study: Arapa district, Azngaro province, Puno region. Includes data preprocessing, feature engineering, model comparison (Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, XGBoost), and implementation framework for resource-constrained rural contexts.
Code for training and validation

PanARGMiner: Pan-genomic Antimicrobial Resistance Gene Miner is a machine learning framework for selecting key antimicrobial resistance features from large-scale genomic data with high accuracy and interpretability.

AI-driven discovery of Metal Organic Frameworks (MOFs) for efficient CO capture from cement plants and catalytic conversion into methanol using solar energy. Includes datasets, preprocessing scripts, machine learning models, and analysis notebooks.
A collection of Machine Learning and Deep Learning projects implemented with frameworks including PyTorch and scikit-learn.
A machine learning project built with Swift and Apples Natural Language framework to perform real-time sentiment analysis on user input.
A text-processing framework for machine-learning workflows based in python
A curated list of awesome Machine Learning frameworks, libraries and software.
A comprehensive machine learning framework for quantitative trading strategies
HLSFactory: A Framework Empowering High-Level Synthesis Datasets for Machine Learning and Beyond
MULTI-evolve: a machine learning-guided end-to-end framework for engineering hyperactive multi-mutant proteins
Distributed tensors and Machine Learning framework with GPU and MPI acceleration in Python

Focuses on developing a predictive framework to minimize customer attrition in the telecommunications sector using statistical inference and machine learning.
